My daily post with all of my characters in it, read this...

Radistor seper=
ated and the Radicons walked off, mumbling about how they never do anything=
 helpful because nobody wants them.

"I say we leave the Maximals!" Strongh=
old said.

"I say we kill the Maximals!" Blender said.

"Yeah, both of you =
guy's plans sound good!" Arrow said.

"Nah, they aren't worth it, let's jus=
t get out of here." Stranato said.

"Too bad for them they never got to see=
 our true light." Train Wreck said.

"But...what about Infectra?" Airbomber=
 said sadly. The Radicons walked away, Airbomber sending a comm message to =
Infectra.

"Infectra, you may come with us if you like, we're leaving this =
dump." Airbomber said.

Plintissa had had enough of Artist, he disappeared =
again and now she couldn't find him! Dracona walked away from Plintissa, wa=
lking along until she detected something on her scanner, the important devi=
ce she had lost earlier was near the Pred base. Dracona flies off, sure tha=
t she can get it on her own. Dracona flies to the Predacon baseand lands, l=
ooking for the lost device.

Plintissa searched for Artist, she finally cam=
e across a tree with a hand sticking out. She shook the tree and Artist fel=
l out. He looked at Plintissa and then struck a pose. Plintissa sighed.

Si=
nesis ran up to his brother.

"Brother! This thing with you and Blizzard ha=
s gotten out of hand! I say you pick her or me, and that is that!" Sinesis =
said. Sinister sighed. He didn't want to do this, but for the better of his=
 brother he had to. He fired at Sinesis, blowing him backwards. Sinesis lea=
ps at Sinister, knocking him down and choking him.

"Ingrate!" Sinesis yell=
ed.

"Idiot!" Sinister yelled back, poking Sinesis in the eyes.

"Lazy ass =
love struck piece of scrap!" Sinesis said, kciking Sinister in the gut. Sin=
ister kneeled over and Sinesis did a running scissor kick on him. Sinesis c=
ontinued to choke Sinister.

Deemos still held his guns at his side, as fdi=
d Inzola. Deemos looked at BrightBlade and smiled, not a nice smile, though=
. Inzola stood back to back with Deemos, ready to fight the enemies off. Su=
ddenly,Sinesis and Sinister came up from the distance, fighting each other =
still. Sinesis and Sinister battled each other right up to BrightBlade, Dee=
mos, and Inzola. Deemos and Inzola laughed. Sinister and Sinesis stopped fi=
ghting and fired at Deemos and Inzola. Deemos and Inzola fired abck and a w=
ar broke out between the 4!

Gangon and Lightmare are still being contained=
...
